tools.name: design_curriculum_module
tools.description: Designs a single curriculum module for a given topic. The workflow is to first propose prerequisite topics and core concepts for the user to approve, then generate a detailed lesson plan based on their feedback.

topic.description: The main topic for the curriculum module to be designed. For example: 'Static Taint Analysis for Web Vulnerabilities'.

user_selected_prerequisites.description: A list of prerequisite topics that the user has confirmed are necessary for this module. This is the result of a previous conversational step.

user_selected_core_concepts.description: A list of core concepts that the user has confirmed should be the focus of the module. This is the result of a previous conversational step.
